query:
-- 查询当前登录用户ID
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE email = 'runyimacau@gmail.com';

-- 创建测试股票用户
INSERT INTO stockUsers (name, initialBalance, status, notes) VALUES 
('客户A', '500000.00', 'active', '测试客户A'),
('客户B', '800000.00', 'active', '测试客户B');

-- 获取刚创建的股票用户ID
SELECT id, name FROM stockUsers WHERE name IN ('客户A', '客户B');

-- 为用户ID=1授权访问这两个股票客户（假设runyimacau@gmail.com的ID是1）
INSERT INTO stockUserPermissions (userId, stockUserId, profitPercentage, deposit, authorizationDate) VALUES 
(1, (SELECT id FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A'), 30, '50000.00', '2024-01-01'),
(1, (SELECT id FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户B'), 25, '80000.00', '2024-02-01');

-- 为客户A添加每日余额数据（最近7天）
INSERT INTO stockBalances (stockUserId, date, balance) VALUES 
((SELECT id FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A'), '2026-01-04', '510000.00'),
((SELECT id FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A'), '2026-01-05', '512000.00'),
((SELECT id FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A'), '2026-01-06', '515000.00'),
((SELECT id FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A'), '2026-01-07', '513000.00'),
((SELECT id FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A'), '2026-01-08', '518000.00'),
((SELECT id FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A'), '2026-01-09', '519802.52'),
((SELECT id FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A'), '2026-01-10', '522000.00');
